text: This is a list of current Royal New Zealand Navy ships. The affiliations (and home ports) are ceremonial only, with the navy operationally stationed at the Devonport Naval Base, Auckland. The Navy operates nine commissioned ships and a number of non commissioned vessels. ==Naval Combat Force== {| class="wikitable" ! ! width="85"|Type ! width="90"|Class ! Displacement ! width="125"|Name ! width="35"|Pennant number ! width="40"|Commissioned !
